tool_description: Geolake offers a fast and accurate geocoding API that supports extended typo correction, returns various localization data (time zone, currency, language). Supports IP address geocoding.
name: Geolake
title: Geolake

api_list.name: Geocode
api_list.description: Geocode a structured address, single query string or ip address

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country code in ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format, e.g. US or CA.

optional_parameters.name: countrycodes
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated list of country codes that are allowed for this request. The country codes should be in ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 format, e.g. US or CA. This can be used if you have data from a few specific countries, but do not have accurate country codes per address. The other address components will be used to determine the most appropriate country code per request.

optional_parameters.name: housenumber
optional_parameters.description: If you have a separate street name, house number and sub number, you can specify the house number here.

optional_parameters.name: ip
optional_parameters.description: IPv4 address in the format '1.2.3.4'. Optionally send in 'detect', to use the IP address of the client that is placing the API request.

optional_parameters.name: street
optional_parameters.description: If you have a separate street name, house number and sub number, you can specify the street name here.

optional_parameters.name: subnumber
optional_parameters.description: If you have a separate street name, house number and sub number, you can specify the sub number here. This can for instance be the suite or apartment number

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Query string, may contain an address consisting of multiple components on a single line. E.g. '123 Your Street Name Here, San Francisco, US'
optional_parameters.default: 123 Your Street Name Here, San Francisco, US

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description: If your don't have a separate street name, house number and sub number, you can provide the equivalent of 'address line 1' here.
